text: Villarrica is a city and commune in southern Chile in the Province of Cautín, Araucanía Region. It is located on the western shore of Villarrica Lake. It is also close to the Villarrica Volcano ski center. Santiago is to the north. ==References== Category:Cities in Chile Category:1550s establishments in South America Category:16th-century establishments in Chile Category:1552 establishments Category:Araucanía Region
title: Villarrica, Chile
